<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Voice Cold as Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3590) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097)

**Requirements**
You are not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).

</column>

---

Channeling the energy of the Crimson Oath into your voice, you pronounce a threat in a tone so icy it freezes the blood. Attempt an Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53); you don't suffer a penalty if the target doesn't understand the language you're speaking, but this otherwise functions as normal. You can't use [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) or any other effect that would cause your Demoralize attempt to lose the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait as part of using this feat. If you critically succeed at your Intimidation check, the target becomes [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36), or stunned 2 if the target is [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). After using this feat, you are fatigued until the end of your next turn, and you can't use this feat again until the end of your next turn.
name: Voice Cold as Death
